# honeycombio_board_view (Resource)

Manages a board view in a Honeycomb flexible board. Maximum of 50 boards views per board.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `board_id` (String) The ID of the flexible board this view belongs to.
- `name` (String) The name of the board view.

### Optional

- `filter` (Block List) List of filters to apply to the board view. **Required:** At least one filter must be specified. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--filter))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the board view.

<a id="nestedblock--filter"></a>
### Nested Schema for `filter`

Required:

- `column` (String) The column to filter on.
- `operation` (String) The operator to apply. See the supported list at [Filter Operators](https://docs.honeycomb.io/api/query-specification/#filter-operators). Not all operators require a value.

Optional:

- `value` (String) The value used for the filter. Not needed if operation is "exists" or "does-not-exist". For "in" or "not-in" operations, provide a comma-separated list of values.
